description:
Fight for Honor and cement your Legacy on these timeless Zen Originals! Seek vengeance in feudal Japan or relive the adventures of one of the best-selling novels of Jules Verne.

A Samurai’s Vengeance: Take on the Hyakki bandit clan to avenge your fallen Master! Train yourself in various fields to take on their leader, Maou in the final showdown.

Verne’s Mysterious Island: Survive the harshest conditions, find the mysterious guardian, and escape the remote island before the smoldering lava devours it all.
name: Pinball FX - Honor and Legacy Pack
